narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Northeast Arc, Inc. is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Danvers, MA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $16.5M in Medicaid payments across 285K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $16.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
